import { cx } from "emotion";
import React from "react";
import PropTypes from "prop-types";
 
import PropTypesExtra from "../utils/prop-types-extra";
 
import mergeProps from "../utils/merge-props";
import {CContainer} from "./flexbox";
 
import getSegmentStyle from "../styles/segment/segment.style";
import getPaddingStyle from "../styles/segment/padding.style";
 
 
export function Segment(props) {
 
  const {
    attached,
    attachedBottom,
    attachedTop,
    basic,
    children: _children,
    compact,
    component,
    disabled,
    empty,
    float,
    horizontal,
    inverted,
    loading,
    nopadding,
    ordinality,
    padded,
    piled,
    placeholder,
    placeholderComponent: _placeholderComponent,
    placeholderProps: _placeholderProps,
    raised,
    stacked,
    tallStacked,
    textAlign,
    variation,
    vertical,
    veryPadded,
    ...otherProps
  } = props;
 
  const styleFlags = {
    disabled,
    loading,
    inverted,
    compact,
    stacked,
    tallStacked,
    piled,
    raised,
    nopadding,
    padded,
    veryPadded,
    attached,
    attachedTop,
    attachedBottom,
    basic,
    vertical,
    horizontal,
    floatedLeft: float === "left",
    floatedRight: float === "right",
    alignRight: textAlign === "right",
    alignCenter: textAlign === "center",
  };
 
  
 
 
  let children = empty ? null : _children;
 
  if (!React.Children.count(children) && !loading && (placeholder || _placeholderProps || _placeholderComponent)) {
 
    const placeholderComponent = _placeholderComponent || CContainer;
 
    const placeholderProps = mergeProps({
      children: placeholder,
      height: 100,
      style: {
        fontSize: "1.3em",
        opacity: 0.7,
        fontStyle: "italic",
        position: "relative",
        fontWeight: 200
      }
    },_placeholderProps);
 
    children = React.createElement(placeholderComponent,placeholderProps);
  }
 
  const newProps = mergeProps({
    className: cx("cm-segment",getSegmentStyle(styleFlags,variation,ordinality))
  },otherProps);
 
  return React.createElement(component,newProps,children);
}
 
Segment.propTypes = {
  attached: PropTypes.bool,
  attachedBottom: PropTypes.bool,
  attachedTop: PropTypes.bool,
  basic: PropTypes.bool,
  children: PropTypes.node,
  compact: PropTypes.bool,
  component: PropTypesExtra.component,
  disabled: PropTypes.bool,
  empty: PropTypes.bool,
  float: PropTypes.oneOf(["left","right"]),
  horizontal: PropTypes.bool,
  inverted: PropTypes.bool,
  loading: PropTypes.bool,
  nopadding: PropTypes.bool,
  ordinality: PropTypes.oneOf(["primary","secondary","tertiary"]),
  padded: PropTypes.bool,
  piled: PropTypes.bool,
  placeholder: PropTypes.node,
  placeholderComponent: PropTypesExtra.component,
  placeholderProps: PropTypes.object,
  raised: PropTypes.bool,
  stacked: PropTypes.bool,
  tallStacked: PropTypes.bool,
  textAlign: PropTypes.oneOf(["left","right","center"]),
  variation: PropTypesExtra.variation,
  vertical: PropTypes.bool,
  veryPadded: PropTypes.bool,
};
 
Segment.defaultProps = {
  component: "div",
};
 
export function BasicSegment(props) {
  return <Segment basic {...props} />;
}
 
export function Padding(props) {
  var newProps = mergeProps({
    className: cx("cm-padding",getPaddingStyle()),
    component: "div"
  },props);
  
  return React.createElement(newProps.component,newProps);
}
 
Code coverage generated by istanbul at Mon Feb 04 2019 18:54:39 GMT+0000 (GMT)
